parameters.name: CopyType
parameters.description: The type of the object that you want to copy. Only the INSTANCE type is supported.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description: The language that specific response parameters will use.

parameters.name: SourceId
parameters.description: The ID of the source object. Only instance IDs are supported.

parameters.name: TargetId
parameters.description: The ID of the target object. Only instance IDs are supported.
